file.name: group-component.openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Group Component
  description: Component
  version: 1.0.0

paths: {}

components:
  schemas:
    MultipleGroup:
      type: object
      required:
        - groups
        - total
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        groups:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Group'
    Group:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - type
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        parent_group_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        corporation_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - Corporation
            - Group
        domain:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        phone_number:
          type: string
        phone_number_2:
          type: string
        address:
          type: object
          properties:
            country:
              type: string
            zip_code:
              type: string
            state:
              type: string
            city:
              type: string
            address_1:
              type: string
            address_2:
              type: string
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        custom_fields:
          type: object
        children:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: string
                format: uuid
              name:
                type: string
    GroupUpdateRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        parent_group_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - Corporation
            - Group
        phone_number:
          type: string
        phone_number_2:
          type: string
        address:
          type: object
          properties:
            country:
              type: string
            zip_code:
              type: string
            state:
              type: string
            city:
              type: string
            address_1:
              type: string
            address_2:
              type: string
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        custom_fields:
          type: object
    GroupCreateRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        parent_group_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        phone_number:
          type: string
        phone_number_2:
          type: string
        address:
          type: object
          properties:
            country:
              type: string
            zip_code:
              type: string
            state:
              type: string
            city:
              type: string
            address_1:
              type: string
            address_2:
              type: string
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - Group
        custom_fields: { }
      required:
        - name
        - type
    GroupInviteRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
    GroupReplaceRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        parent_group_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - Group
        phone_number:
          type: string
        phone_number_2:
          type: string
        address:
          type: object
          properties:
            country:
              type: string
            zip_code:
              type: string
            state:
              type: string
            city:
              type: string
            address_1:
              type: string
            address_2:
              type: string
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    MultipleMember:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        members:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Member'
    MultipleMemberInfo:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          format: int64
        members:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/MemberInfo'
    SingleMember:
      type: object
      properties:
        member:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Member'
    Members:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Member"
    Member:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        user_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        role:
          type: string
          enum:
            - super_admin
            - admin
            - manager
            - staff
        category:
          type: string
        invited:
          type: boolean
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        custom_fields: { }
    MemberInfo:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        user_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        role:
          type: string
          enum:
            - super_admin
            - admin
            - manager
            - staff
        category:
          type: string
          enum:
            - member
            - guest
        invited:
          type: boolean
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        profile:
          type: object
          properties:
            type:
              type: string
            family_name:
              type: string
            given_name:
              type: string
            phonetic_family_name:
              type: string
            phonetic_given_name:
              type: string
            email:
              type: string

            emails:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string

            picture:
              type: string
            phone_number:
              type: string
            phone_number_2:
              type: string
            language:
              type: string
              enum:
                - ja
                - en
                - en-US
                - de-DE
                - fe-FR
                - es-ES
            address:
              type: object
              properties:
                country:
                  type: string
                zip_code:
                  type: string
                state:
                  type: string
                city:
                  type: string
                address_1:
                  type: string
                address_2:
                  type: string
